description: This file is a shell script used for managing the static WAN connection, including bringing the WAN interface up or down based on link or desired state changes. It handles system configurations, interacts with system events, and controls network parameters for establishing connectivity.

methods.name: bring_wan_down
methods.description: Disables the WAN interface, updates system variables, and restarts services as part of bringing the WAN connection down.

methods.name: bring_wan_up
methods.description: Enables the WAN interface, updates system variables, and initiates network configurations to bring the WAN connection up.
